mapper.update: update ITEMFILE set IID = #{iid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PID = #{pid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, FN = #{fn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TP = #{tp,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SIZ = #{siz,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, TIM = #{tim,jdbcType=DATE}, TXT = #{txt,jdbcType=BLOB} where IFID = #{ifid,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select IFID, IID, PID, FN, TP, SIZ, TIM, TXT from ITEMFILE
